    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: import pandas as pd
    4: 
    5: object_pyarrow_numpy = ("object", "string[pyarrow_numpy]")
    6: 
    7: 
    8: def _convert_na_value(ser, expected):
    9:     if ser.dtype != object:
   10:         if ser.dtype.storage == "pyarrow_numpy":
   11:             expected = expected.fillna(np.nan)
   12:         else:
   13:             # GH#18463
   14:             expected = expected.fillna(pd.NA)
   15:     return expected
